titles.title: Providing for the adoption of the resolution (H. Res. 240) amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to reinstate certain provisions of the rules relating to procedures of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to the form in which those provisions existed at the close of the 108th Congress.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-59, by Mr. Dreier.
Upon the adoption of H. Res. 241, H. Res. 240 is considered to be adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 30.

action.text: Mr. Dreier moved to consider the resolution.
On motion to consider the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 241.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 406 - 20, 1 Present (Roll no. 145).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/27/2005--Passed House without amendment. Provides that upon the adoption of this resolution, H.Res. 240 shall be adopted (amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to reinstate to the form in which they existed at the close of the 108th Congress certain rules provisions relating to procedures of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct).
